text: Thanks! This microscope illuminates at the same time with 3 sheets (with diff angle); not sure why the downward stripes are not visible..It can be a misalignemnet of that 3rd sheet; thanks for the material, I`ll take a look at it (with help of the local image analysts..); Agar: I also filter it, but I got the feeling that something get stuck on the borders (tiny bubble? debris?..) Next time I ll image the "side" of the agar to check it.
